## History.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `History` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(state: IAtom<T>, maxLen?: number, changed?: Predicate2<T>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | <code>IAtom&lt;T&gt;</code> | parent state |
|  maxLen | <code>number</code> | max size of undo stack |
|  changed | <code>Predicate2&lt;T&gt;</code> | predicate to determine changed values (default <code>!equiv(a,b)</code>) |
